full_text: The over exaggeration is what kills me. Just taking shit way to far and saying its life changing/threatening when its fucking not if you had half a brain. Its almost like some of these folks are JUST NOW realizing politics is a cess pool of heathens.

Im like Affleck in Good Will Hunting when he told Damon "the greatest day of my life will be I show up here and you are gone. No good bye no nothing." That how I feel about Twitter. Waiting for the day I wake up and its just gone.
